comment: The Allies would tell freshly captured Axis soldiers, 'Enjoy the war while you can - the peace will be terrible'. Four times more Germans died in the surrender of Germany than during the entire war.
amr:
# ::snt The Allies would tell freshly captured Axis soldiers, 'Enjoy the war while you can - the peace will be terrible'. Four times more Germans died in the surrender of Germany than during the entire war.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / military
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Allies"))
            :ARG1 (e / enjoy-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w / war)
                  :time (p / possible-01)
                  :ARG1-of p
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / terrible-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / peace))))
            :ARG2 (s / soldier
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Axis"))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / capture-01
                        :manner (f / fresh-04))))
      :snt2 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Germany"))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                        :ARG3 (t3 / times
                              :quant 4)
                        :ARG4 (d2 / die-01
                              :time (w2 / war
                                    :mod (e2 / entire)))))
            :time (s2 / surrender-01
                  :ARG0 c4
                  :ARG1 c4)))

comment: Heh heh, a little triggered are we? The truth fears no investigation. Feel free to debunk what I have produced using credible sources & not memes. Meanwhile, why not start here with the (((Freemasons))) & their genocidal bloodlust against Christians?
amr:

      :snt1 (t / trigger-01

                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (f / fear-01

            :ARG1 (ii / investigate-01
                  :polarity -))
      :snt3 (f2 / feel-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (f3 / free-04
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG3 (d / debunk-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (p / produce-01
                                    :ARG0 (ii2 / i)))
                        :manner (u / use-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (s / source
                                    :mod (c / credible))
                              :manner (ii3 / instead-of-91
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / meme)
                                    :ARG2 s)))))
      :snt4 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (s2 / start-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (h2 / here)
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and

                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Christian")))

                              :mod (g / genocidal)
                              :poss p3))
                  :time (m3 / meanwhile))))
